exec forge run ./dir1+test
cmp stdout golden.txt

-- golden.txt --
earthly
--allow-privileged
./dir1+test
Image ./dir1+test output as test

{"artifacts":{},"images":{"./dir1+test":"test"}}
-- earthly_stdout.txt --
Image ./dir1+test output as test
-- dir1/blueprint.cue --
version: "1.0"
project: {
    name: "test"
    ci: {
        targets: {
            test: {
                privileged: true
            }
        }
    }
}
